Instruction: Mix together the flour, baking powder, and shortening in a large bowl until the mixture is crumbly. Add sugar, eggs, and milk; stir until well combined.

Divide the batter equally between two greased 8-inch round or square baking pans. Top the batter in each pan with bits of butter the size of lima beans. Sprinkle 1/4 cup brown sugar over each cake, and dust with cinnamon.
Bake in a preheated oven at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for approximately 30 minutes.
